infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Granting access will allow you to take photos and add them to attachment fields,add them to profile picture and share story with friends
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload pictures.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: If not allowed, you will be unable to share your location in chats or use location-based services. CetChat also uses this info to deliver relevant search results and to keep your account safe when resgitering or logging into CetChat.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: If not allowed, you will be unable to share your location in chats or use location-based services. CetChat also uses this info to deliver relevant search results and to keep your account safe when resgitering or logging into CetChat.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload pictures.
infoPlist.NSNetworkUsageDescription: This app needs access to your network to send network data.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: If not allowed, you will be unable to share your location in chats or use location-based services. CetChat also uses this info to deliver relevant search results and to keep your account safe when resgitering or logging into CetChat.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: If not allowed, you will be unable to share your location in chats or use location-based services.CetChat also uses this info to deliver relevant search results and to keep your account safe when resgitering or logging into CetChat.

plugins.photosPermission: CetChat needs access to your photos so you can select a profile picture
